tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE election_debates_schedule (
    debate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    debate_topic VARCHAR(255),
    debate_date DATE,
    moderator_name VARCHAR(100),
    participant_1_name VARCHAR(100),
    participant_2_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE debate_participants (
    debate_id INT,
    participant_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (debate_id, participant_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (debate_id) REFERENCES debates_schedule(debate_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE debate_attendance (
    attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    debate_id INT,
    participant_id INT,
    attendance_status BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (debate_id) REFERENCES debates_schedule(debate_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE debate_questions (
    question_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    debate_id INT,
    question_text TEXT,
    question_category VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (debate_id) REFERENCES debates_schedule(debate_id)
);
